timeline.bodyText: Let's name this public Page getColumns(int... columns), which matches the other methods in this class better.
timeline.author: dain

replies.bodyText: Renamed method and accepted a varargs argument.
replies.author: pettyjamesm

timeline.message: Add copyPositions and getColumns utility methods to Page

Prefer builtin Page methods that avoid Block[] copies

Updates various operators and utilities that explicitly create and
manipulate Block arrays to use equivalent Page methods when
possible
